dataList.dlg: I can follow your commands no problem~ Obedience might be a tall order, though~
When you're too tired to get up, it might be best to stay in and relax~
On a wonderful day... I sometimes bathe in the sunlight. I like the warmth it wraps me in.
When dusk falls, and even the moonlight is concealed by the clouds... Look, it really does blend with the shadow, doesn't it?
It's always fun to slash things. Doing it out of obligation, though... it rather dampens the mood.
It's a mystery how people are so obsessed over what they own. If only they could grow a spirit of generosity.
I prefer to have autonomy in choosing my opponent. Doing as you're told all the time... It'd be a pointless life.
You're the only one I treat with genuine respect, Lord Dante. I wouldn't be calling you my lord if I didn't truly feel that you deserve the title.
What I like about you... is that you don't demand that I bow to you. Receiving orders from your boss with your back courteously bent... That's only really fun in movies, no?
Where'd you go, Lord Dante? Have you hidden in the clouds?
Thanks. Is there anything else you want me to fell?
If that's your order~
Can I slit them however I see fit?
Ah, you're here, Lord Dante.
It won't be as fun, but I'll do it~
I think I could do a better job next time?
Mmpf!
What a joy it is to slash~
I don't envy your outlook there, Lord Dante~
I told you, I follow your commands no problem~
Mmm... It's fine~ I followed your orders after all, right?
Wasn't my swordmanship fashionable to behold? Huhu...
I only sent them where they belonged, by simply cutting down what I saw~
The blade must've gotten a bit dull~
